infeasible_scenarios.reasoning: The eval sandbox runs JavaScript/Node.js. Testing Swift or Kotlin platform-specific PubNub initialization would require Xcode, Android Studio, or native compilers which are not available in the sandbox environment. The mobile-specific configuration patterns (heartbeatInterval, presenceTimeout) are already tested in the JavaScript scenarios.

infeasible_scenarios.scenarios: Realistic latency and network simulation testing
infeasible_scenarios.reasoning: The skill instructs to test with realistic latency and simulated packet loss. This requires running multiple concurrent PubNub-connected clients, live network connections, and network simulation tooling. The eval sandbox has no PubNub keys, no ability to run multiple concurrent processes, and no network simulation infrastructure.
